title.narrative: Western Balkans: Accountability, Technology and Institutional Openness Network in South East Europe

description.narrative: WFD works in the Western Balkans with a consortium of local organisations Action SEE project enshrine the expertise and knowledge of the partners acquired during the joint implementation of a range of projects across the SEE region aimed at enhancing rule of law and good governance. WFD takes part in the production of the Regional Index of Good Governance, namely on its Parliamentary part. WFD will work on the Road Maps that would be produced after the measurements, and promotion of the results using the experience with regional networks.to help make national parliaments more transparent, effective and accountable.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development
